summary: The implementation covers most requirements but has several missing features. The backend withdrawal and landing page management is implemented, and the earnings dashboard is present. However, several UI updates (black backgrounds, phone masking, chatbot repositioning) are not fully evident in the diff. Post-login redirection appears to be implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Change EvergreenAIChatbot component background to solid black (#000000)
missing_requirements.reason: EvergreenAIChatbot.tsx is modified in the diff, but the truncated content doesn't show clear evidence of the background color change to solid black for both collapsed button and expanded chat interface

missing_requirements.requirement: Reposition EvergreenAIChatbot floating button to the left side of the viewport
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence in the diff of changing chatbot positioning from right to left. The visible code shows position state management but no left-side positioning CSS

missing_requirements.requirement: Mask phone number 9263989760 throughout the application to display as '********60'
missing_requirements.reason: While FloatingWhatsAppButton shows masking implementation, the diff doesn't show complete evidence of masking in Footer, HeroSection, VideoEditingSection, or PaymentProofForm despite those files being modified

hallucinated_features.description: Video editing payment modal integration with hardcoded packageId BigInt(999)
hallucinated_features.reason: VideoEditingSection.tsx shows a PaymentModal being opened with packageId set to BigInt(999) and isVideoEditing flag. This specific package ID approach was not explicitly requested in the BuildRequest
